message: Let's split it 50/50 to start. Your turn!
You started with a 50/50 offer, I'll counter with a 4/1 offer. Your turn!
That's a bit too skewed towards you, Bob. I'll make a new offer.
I'm willing to compromise. Your turn to decide!
You're getting more aggressive, I'll try to get more too. Your turn!
You're pushing too hard, Bob. I'll try to counter.
I'm trying to find a sweet spot. Will you meet me here?
I'm not budging, you're getting closer to my target. Don't get left with nothing!
I'm not willing to get left with almost nothing. I'll try to make a final push.
This is my last offer. I'm trying to salvage something reasonable.
